sourcesContent:
export const theme = Object.freeze({
  colors: {
    primaryBlack: '#000000',
    primaryWhite: '#ffffff',
    bgForm: '#151515',
    bgFormDark: '#1f1f1f',
    iconDark: '#121212',
    primaryDark: '#161616',
    primaryDarkGray: '#1111111a',
    secondaryGray: '#e8e8e8',
    lightGray: '#d9d9d9',
    bgLight: '#f6f6f7',
    bgPurple: '#ecedfd66',
    lightPurple: '#7b7ede',
    borderColor: '#bedbb066',
    primaryBlue: '#8fa1d0',
    lightBlue: '#b8bcfd',
    primaryCream: '#fcfcfc',
    secondaryPurple: '#5255bc',
    secondaryPurpleBlue: '#979cea',
    primaryGreen: '#bedbb0',
    hoverGreen: '#9dc888',
    secondaryBlue: '#ecedfd',
    secondaryColar: '#c04d4d',
    secondaryPink: '#e09cb5',
    secondaryRed: '#ff0000a9',
    shadow: '#16161614',
    textCard: '#161616b3',
    textDark: '#16161680',
    textGrey: '#161616cc',
    transparentBlack: '#1616161a',
  },

  lineHeights: {
    main: 1.28,
    normal: 'normal',
    medium: 1.42,
    text: 1.33,
  },

  fontSizes: {
    large: '40px',
    title: '28px',
    subtitle: '18px',
    text: '14px',
    info: '12px',
  },

  fontWeights: {
    bold: 700,
    medium: 600,
    normal: 500,
    regular: 400,
  },
  letterSpacing: {
    medium: '-1.12px',
    normal: '-1.6px',
    small: '-0.28px',
  },

  borderRadius: {
    main: '8px',
    task: '4px 0px 0px 4px',
  },

  border: {
    darkTheme: 'border: 1px solid #BEDBB0;',
    purpleTheme: 'border: 1px solid #5255BC;',
    popupCard: '1px solid rgba(190, 219, 176, 0.50)',
  },
  shadow: {
    popup: '0px 4px 16px 0px rgba(17, 17, 17, 0.10)',
    editPopup: '0px 4px 16px 0px rgba(22, 22, 22, 0.05)',
  },

  transition: {
    normal: 'all 150ms linear',
  },

  transform: {},
});
